periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: Patchy blowing dust after 3pm. Mostly sunny. High near 71, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 21 to 26 mph, with gusts as high as 41 mph.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 43. Southwest wind 16 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 39 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: Areas of blowing dust between 7am and 5pm. Mostly sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 53 in the afternoon. West wind 21 to 36 mph, with gusts as high as 54 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Slight Chance Snow Showers
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers after 5am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 29. Southwest wind 7 to 26 mph, with gusts as high as 43 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers before 5pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 50. Southwest wind 7 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 26. Southwest wind 7 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 53. West wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Snow Showers
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers after 5am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 29. North wind 3 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Friday
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Snow Showers then Chance Rain And Snow Showers
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers before 7am, then a chance of rain and snow showers. Partly sunny, with a high near 55. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 17 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain And Snow Showers
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 9pm, then a slight chance of rain and snow showers. Partly cloudy, with a low around 29. Southwest wind 5 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 16 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain And Snow Showers
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain and snow showers before 5pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 57. East wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 30. Southeast wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 11am and 5pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 58. East wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 28. East wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 17 mph.
